text: READ: Harris-Trump presidential debate transcript  —  Harris and Trump are meeting for the first time on the debate stage.  —  LIVE  —  Former President Donald Trump and Vice President Kamala Harris participate in a presidential debate in Philadelphia, Sept. 10, 2024.

Kamala Harris dogwalks Trump  —  🚨 This special, five-edition week of PN is made possible by paid subscribers.  If you aren't one already, please sign up to support our independent coverage.  🚨  —  🚀 Subscribe to Public Notice 🚀

A quarter of Republicans think Trump should seize power even if he loses  —  As the election approaches, new polling shows the breadth of support for Trump's authoritarian tendencies.  —  If the 2024 presidential election were held today, it's not clear who would win.

Trump repeats false pet-eating claims leaving Harris dumbfounded as Republican nominee goes off rails  —  Former president repeats false claims that immigrants in Ohio were eating pets  —  Your support helps us to tell the story  —  As your White House correspondent, I ask the tough questions and seek the answers that matter.

Trump Wins the Debate — For Harris  —  The vice president let Trump do the work of executing her strategy.  —  Vice President Kamala Harris did exactly what the political professionals said she should do.  —  In some cases, that was what operatives would tell any candidate to do in any election …

Harris campaign wants a second presidential debate with Trump  —  The second meeting, if Trump agrees, would come in addition to an Oct. 1 debate between both major-party vice-presidential nominees  —  Vice President Kamala Harris wants to go another debate round with former president Donald Trump.

Trump pushes baseless claim about immigrants ‘eating the pets’  —  The former president was referring to rumors that have spread on social media for days claiming that Haitian immigrants in Ohio are abducting and eating pets.  —  Former President Donald Trump, during Tuesday's presidential debate …

Taylor Swift endorses Kamala Harris  —  The musician's endorsement had been eagerly anticipated.  —  Pop superstar Taylor Swift endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris' presidential candidacy on Tuesday night after the conclusion of the high-stakes debate.  —  “I will be casting my vote …

Trump on ObamaCare repeal: ‘I have concepts of a plan’  —  Former President Trump said during Tuesday night's debate he was interested in trying to repeal ObamaCare again, but indicated he doesn't have a plan to replace it.  —  “We are working on things.  We're going to do it.

Political consultant points out ‘Nate Silver is paid by Peter Thiel’ after 538 projects Trump victory  —  On Sunday, September 8, polling expert and FiveThirtyEight founder Nate Silver updated his presidential election forecast and gave GOP nominee Donald Trump a 63.8 percent chance of winning …

At Least Two Saudi Officials May Have Deliberately Assisted 9/11 Hijackers, New Evidence Suggests  —  Newly revealed information also raises questions about whether the FBI and CIA mishandled or downplayed evidence of the kingdom's possible ties to the plotters.

GOP race to replace McConnell heats up  —  The leadership race to replace retiring Senate Republican Leader Mitch McConnell (Ky.) is heating up as Senate Republican Whip John Thune (S.D.) announced Tuesday that he will transfer $4 million to the National Republican Senatorial Committee (NRSC) …

Centrist Maine Democrat says he'll support GOP's short-term funding bill  —  A centrist House Democrat said Tuesday that he will back the Republicans' short-term government funding bill if it hits the floor Wednesday, as scheduled, becoming the first Democrat to announce support for the controversial spending package.
